EmailTemplate.name: 2013: YB successful application notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Youth Board application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on joining the Youth Board!
As a member of the Youth Board you are taking on a very important role in The Challenge Society.
What happens next?
There will be a training & induction session for new Youth Board members.
We will email you details about this nearer the time. So, if you change your email address, make sure you let us know!
We hope you are looking forward to being part of the Youth Board.
The Challenge Society
